text: wal-muh'sanatu mina l-nisai illa ma malakat aymanukum kitaba l-lahi ʿalaykum wa-uhilla lakum ma waraa dhalikum an tabtaghu bi-amwalikum muh'sinina ghayra musafihina fama is'tamtaʿtum bihi min'hunna faatuhunna ujurahunna faridatan wala junaha ʿalaykum fima taradaytum bihi min baʿdi l-faridati inna l-laha kana ʿaliman hakiman
